name: Yogha Raj Dhayal
quote: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man. Any sufficiently advancedtechnology is equivalent to magic.
myStory: I am Yogha Raj Dhayal. I am a fresher looking for an opportunity to upskill me and contribute for the company. I have a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript as well as Github. I developed some projects using these technologies mentioned above. I hope my skills are matched for your requirement.
secondaryEducation: Vivekananda Vidyalaya Matric Higher Secondary School

ugEducation: Sri Krishna Arts and Science College
